item.title: Goodbye, Minute Maid frozen juices
item.description: Coca-Cola, which owns Minute Maid, has announced it will discontinue its line of frozen juice concentrates, which have been a staple in many American homes over the past 80 years.

item.title: China bans hidden car door handles, a design popularized by Tesla
item.description: China has introduced new regulations, starting in 2027, requiring all car doors to open manually from both sides. Electric door handles can malfunction in a crash or battery failure.
item.content:encoded:
. Tesla's exterior door handles, which are electronically operated, can fail to operate in an emergency. China will ban exclusively electronic door handles on cars sold in the country starting next year.'/>
